fixed_xml: <ITEM>14. <BIBL><TITLE>Le vrai Pietisie</TITLE> par <AUTHOR>Msr. Pierre Roques</AUTHOR></BIBL>. <ITEM>Item, <BIBL><TITLE>Essai de morale</TITLE> par <AUTHOR>Msr. de Chanteren</AUTHOR>, in billigem Preis; im Berichthaus zu erfragen.</ITEM></ITEM>
explanation: The XML was missing an opening <ITEM> tag before 'Item,'. This was fixed by adding the <ITEM> tag.
